writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: Do you think I'm a pushover?

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_02_LUNCH_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: Ash can you give me the answers to tomorrow's test?

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_03_CLASSROOM_CHOICE_01
writing.text: Send Max a note if she's okay

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_03_CLASSROOM_CHOICE_02
writing.text: Don't send Max a note if she's okay

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_03_CLASSROOM_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: The bell rings... Class is over.

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_03_DESK_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: What do you think about Max?

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_03_DESK_DIALOGUE_04
writing.text: Do you think Max is a push over??

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_03_DESK_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_01_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: Yeah. Well... Good for us. Lol.

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_03_DESK_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_01_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: Well if there is anything you need, you just ask and Max will get it for you.

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_03_DESK_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_01_DIALOGUE_05
writing.text: C'mon it's not like that. We're friends.

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_03_DESK_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_02_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: Well if there is anything you need, you just ask and Max will get it for you. Always.

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_03_DESK_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_02_DIALOGUE_05
writing.text: That's not kindness... That's just being a pushover. IDK.

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_03_DESK_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_02_DIALOGUE_07
writing.text: C'mon it's not like that. We're friends.

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_04_CAFETERIA_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: You see Ash and Max hovering in a corner and whispering just before you reach them.

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_04_CAFETERIA_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: When you're close, they break apart and act normal.

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_04_CAFETERIA_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: You see Max is acting weird but decide to go on with the normal lunch and talk about the new games in the arcade.

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_05_CLASSROOM_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: Max is still thoughtful. Ash doesn't seem disturbed. What did they talk about?

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_05_CLASSROOM_DIALOGUE_02_CHOICE_01_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: Yeah yeah I'm fine. Just thinking :)

writing.name: DAY6_TRANSITION_05_CLASSROOM_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: School bell rings and you don't have time to ask Max anything else.
